message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  To make this a quick and easy deal, I'm offering it to you at $11,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is significantly below its value.  Let's meet in the middle - how about $10,500?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to compromise, but I can only go up to $9,800. Can you meet me there?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $9,800 is close, but I'm still aiming for a price that reflects the true value of this product. Would you consider $10,200?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to compromise, but I can only go up to $9,500. Can you meet me there?
